recentthread_avatar.name: recentthread_avatar
recentthread_avatar.title: Show the avatar of the first poster
recentthread_avatar.description: If yes, the avatar of the first poster will be shown.

recentthread_lastavatar.name: recentthread_lastavatar
recentthread_lastavatar.title: Show the avatar of the last poster
recentthread_lastavatar.description: If yes, the avatar of the last poster will be shown.

recentthread_forumskip.name: recentthread_forumskip
recentthread_forumskip.title: Forums To Ignore
recentthread_forumskip.description: The forums threads should not be pulled from.

recentthread_subject_length.name: recentthread_subject_length
recentthread_subject_length.title: Max Title Length
recentthread_subject_length.description: The amount of characters before the rest of the title is truncated. Enter 0 for no limit.

recentthreads_subject_breaker.name: recentthread_subject_breaker
recentthreads_subject_breaker.title: Word Breaking
recentthreads_subject_breaker.description: If selected, the title will be kept to full words only, not cut off.

recentthreads_which_groups.name: recentthread_which_groups
recentthreads_which_groups.title: Permissions
recentthreads_which_groups.description: These groups cannot view the recent threads on index.

recentthreads_prefix.name: recentthread_prefix
recentthreads_prefix.title: Thread Prefix
recentthreads_prefix.description: If set to yes, thread prefixes will be shown.

recentthreads_prefix_only.name: recentthread_prefix_only
recentthreads_prefix_only.title: Which Prefix
recentthreads_prefix_only.description: A thread must have one of these prefix ids to show, separate with a comma.  Leave blank to not restrict.

recentthreads_xthreads.name: recentthread_xthreads
recentthreads_xthreads.title: XThreads
recentthreads_xthreads.description: If set to yes, custom thread fields will be loaded.

recentthreads_show_create_date.name: recentthread_show_create_date
recentthreads_show_create_date.title: Show Creation Time
recentthreads_show_create_date.description: If set to yes, the thread start date will be shown.

recentthreads_format_names.name: recentthread_format_names
recentthreads_format_names.title: Format Usernames
recentthreads_format_names.description: If set to yes, format the username of the thread starter and last poster.

recentthreads_pages_shown.name: recentthread_pages_shown
recentthreads_pages_shown.title: Show On These Pages
recentthreads_pages_shown.description: The pages to show the recent threads on.  One entry per line.

recentthreads_use_breadcrumbs.name: recentthread_use_breadcrumbs
recentthreads_use_breadcrumbs.title: Use breadcrumbs for forum name
recentthreads_use_breadcrumbs.description: If yes, a forum list will be shown.  Otherwise just the forum the thread resides in.

recentthreads_breadcrumber_separator.name: recentthread_breadcrumb_separator
recentthreads_breadcrumber_separator.title: Breadcrumb Separator
recentthreads_breadcrumber_separator.description: The separator for the forum list.  No effect if breadcrumbs are disabled.  HTML allowed.

recentthreads_full_breadcrumb.name: recentthread_full_breadcrumb
recentthreads_full_breadcrumb.title: Show Full Path
recentthreads_full_breadcrumb.description: Whether to show the full path or just the parent.  Note that breadcrumb must be enabled for this to have any effect.
